sentences.en: ...the question of whether microbial life exists, or once existed, on Mars.
sentences.cn: ...这个火星上是否存在或曾经存在过微生物的问题。

sentences.en: All fermentative processes are the results of microbial activity.
sentences.cn: 一切发酵过程都是微生物作用的结果.

sentences.en: Commonly prescribed are anti - microbial mouthwashes containing the active ingredient chlorhexidine gluconate.
sentences.cn: 抗菌抗菌漱口水都包含有效成分--太葡糖酸盐.

sentences.en: Microbial degradation critically affects the fate and behavior of pesticides in soil.
sentences.cn: 生物降解主要影响土壤中农药的行为和命运.

sentences.en: Microbial infections now kill 17m people a year.
sentences.cn: 细菌感染现在每年杀死1700万人。

sentences.en: Microbial inoculum could enhance microbial community functional diversity and evenness degree.
sentences.cn: 接种菌剂提高了微生物群落功能多样性和群落均匀度.

sentences.en: Microbial lipases, as biocatalyst, were widely used in many industrial fields.
sentences.cn: 微生物脂肪酶是一类广泛应用于诸多工业领域的生物催化剂.

sentences.en: Microbial production of glycerol have various characters in production raw, mechanism recovery.
sentences.cn: 微生物合成丙三醇在生产原料 、 生产机制、提取方面各具特点.

sentences.en: Microbial reactions play key roles in biocatalysis and biodegradation.
sentences.cn: 在生物催化和生物降解中微生物反应起了关键的作用.

sentences.en: Microbial strain is the basis of the fermentation industry.
sentences.cn: 微生物菌种是发酵工业的基础.

sentences.en: Most of these schemes have been established from studies on microbial and animal systems.
sentences.cn: 这些图解大部分是建立在微生物和动物系统研究上的.

sentences.en: Numerous microbial cultures convert heptachlor to its expoxide.
sentences.cn: 许多微生物培养基可以把七氯转化为它的环氧化物.

sentences.en: Objective: to eliminate the bacteriostatic action of Eheo - camphoradin in microbial limit examination.
sentences.cn: 目的: 消除微生物限度检查法中 十滴水 的抑菌作用.

sentences.en: Our main microbial fertilizer production and sales " Jiebang Ji - source. "
sentences.cn: 我们主要生产销售微生物肥料 “ 杰邦基源素 ”.

sentences.en: Quite unexpectedly, vertebrate physiologists and microbial biochemists had found a common ground.
sentences.cn: 出乎意外, 脊椎动物生理学家和微生物生化学家找到了共同阵地.

sentences.en: Soil organic matter is the product of microbial decomposition of plant and animal residues.
sentences.cn: 土壤有机质是微生物分解植物和动物残体的产物.

sentences.en: The process is repeated until a microbial culture acclimated to the specific industrial waste is developed.
sentences.cn: 重复以上过程,直至微生物的培养液已达到驯化于特定的工业废水为止.

words.tran_cn: 微球菌；球状细菌；细球菌

phrases.tran_cn: 微生物活性；微生物活动

trans.tran_cn: 微生物的，由细菌引起的
trans.tran_en: Microbial means relating to or caused by microbes
